title: Be Happier Than me - Novel Updates
genre: Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Brotherhood   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Doctors   First Love   Modern Day   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Short Story   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: 慕容侠
description:
Please be happier than me,
Before I give up in embarrassment.
No matter how painful it is,
You needn’t be sorry to make up for it,
At least I can fulfil your pursuit.
(Lyrics from Daniel Chan’s ‘Be Happier Than Me’)>
